Name: La Familia
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
30 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of square of chocolate and popcorn.
